Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: phir jab ye doot loot ke yahaan pahunche
to usane kaha, "tum to aparichit log ho.
unhonne kaha, "nahin, balki ham to tumhaare paas vahee cheez lekar aae hai, jisake vishay mein ve sandeh kar rahe the
aur ham tumhaare paas yaqeenee cheez lekar aae hai, aur ham bilakul sach kah rahe hai

atev ab tum apane gharavaalon ko lekar raatri ke kisee hisse mein nikal jao, aur svayan un sabake peechhe-peechhe chalo. aur tumamen se koee bhee peechhe mudakar na dekhe. bas chale jao, jidhar ka tumhe aadesh hai.
hamane use apana yah faisala pahuncha diya ki praatah hote-hote unakee jad kat chukee hogee
itane mein nagar ke log khush-khush aa pahunche
usane kaha, "ye mere atithi hai. meree fazeehat mat karana
allaah ka dar rakho, mujhe rusava na karo.
unhonne kaha, "kya hamane tumhen duniya bhar ke logon ka zimma lene se roka nahin tha
usane kaha, "tumako yadi kuchh karana hai, to ye meree (qaum kee) betiyaan (vidhitah vivaah ke lie) maujood hai.
tumhaare jeevan kee saugandh, ve apanee mastee mein khoe hue the
antatah pau phatate-phatate ek bhayankar aavaaz ne unhen aa liya
aur hamane us bastee ko talapat kar diya, aur unapar kankareele patthar barasae
nishchay hee isamen bhaapanevaalon ke lie nishaaniyaan hai
aur vah (bastee) saarvajanik maarg par hai
nishchay hee isamen mominon ke lie ek badee nishaanee hai
aur nishchay hee aisa vaale bhee atyaachaaree the
phir hamane unase bhee badala liya, aur ye donon (bhoo-bhaag) khule maarg par sthit hai
